title: Essay Outline
description: Generate a structured outline for an essay on any topic
content: Create a detailed essay outline for a [length] essay on the topic of "[topic]". Include an introduction with a compelling thesis statement, [number] main body paragraphs with key points and supporting evidence, and a conclusion. For each section, provide a brief description of what should be included.

variables.name: topic
variables.default: the impact of artificial intelligence on society

title: Blog Post
description: Generate a complete blog post on any topic
content: Write a [length] blog post about "[topic]" for an audience of [audience]. The tone should be [tone]. Structure the post with an engaging introduction, [number] key sections with subheadings, and a conclusion with a call to action. Include [specific] to make the content more valuable.

variables.name: specific
variables.default: practical examples, statistics, and actionable advice

title: Creative Story
content:
Write a [length] [genre] story with the following elements:

Main character: [character]
Setting: [setting]
Conflict: [conflict]
Theme: [theme]

The story should have a clear beginning that introduces the character and setting, a middle that develops the conflict, and an ending that resolves the story in a [resolution] way. Use [style] writing style with vivid descriptions and engaging dialogue.

variables.name: character
variables.default: a brilliant scientist who discovers a way to communicate with parallel universes

variables.name: setting
variables.default: a near-future research facility in Antarctica

variables.name: conflict
variables.default: the scientist accidentally opens a portal that threatens to merge realities

variables.name: theme
variables.default: the unforeseen consequences of scientific progress

title: Professional Email
description: Create a professional email for any business purpose
content:
Write a professional email for the following purpose:

From: [sender]
To: [recipient]
Subject: [subject]
Purpose: [purpose]

The email should have a professional greeting, clear body with [tone] tone, and an appropriate sign-off. The total length should be approximately [length] paragraphs.

variables.name: sender
variables.default: Alex Johnson, Marketing Manager at XYZ Corp

variables.name: recipient
variables.default: Sam Williams, CEO of ABC Company

variables.name: purpose
variables.default: proposing a collaboration between our companies on an upcoming marketing campaign

title: Product Description
description: Create compelling product descriptions for marketing
content:
Write a compelling [length] product description for [product], which is a [category] product that [main_benefit]. The target audience is [audience]. Include the following elements:

1. An attention-grabbing headline
2. A brief overview of what the product is
3. [number] key features and their benefits
4. Technical specifications (if relevant)
5. A persuasive call to action

Use a [tone] tone that will resonate with the target audience and highlight the product's unique selling points, such as [USP].

variables.name: main_benefit
variables.default: provides clean, great-tasting water while removing 99.9% of contaminants

variables.name: audience
variables.default: health-conscious homeowners looking for affordable water purification solutions

variables.name: USP
variables.default: eco-friendly filter technology, cost-effectiveness, and sleek design
